amendment.description: Page 58, line 3, after the dollar amount, ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the appropriation by $2 under the Environmental Programs and Management account; to increase the appropriation by $1 under the Environmental Programs and Managment account; to increase the appropriation by $1 under the State and Tribal Assistance Grant account; and to increase the appropriation by $1 under the Sate and Tribal Assistance Grants account.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Conaway amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Conaway.
